item.title: OpenSSL Cookbook
item.description: 1 OpenSSL OpenSSL is an open source project that consists of a cryptographic library and an SSL/TLS toolkit. From the projectâ€™s web site: The OpenSSL Project is a collaborative effort to develop a robust, commercial-grade, full-featured, and Open Source toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) and Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols as well as a full-strength general purpose cryptography library. The project is managed by a worldwide community of volunteers that use the Internet to communicate, plan, and develop the OpenSSL toolkit and its related documentation.
